\chapter*{Machine Learning Exercises}

Some written example codes when following online courses (offered by Lazyprogrammer, some utility files from https://lazyprogrammer.me/) and a few small projects.

Also some snippets of coursework codes I wrote in the optimization and model-based image processing courses (just snippets as the lecturers may still be using the same exercises).

\begin{itemize}
\item linear regression in numpy
\item logistic regression in numpy
\item deep learning 1: feedforward and backpropagation in numpy
\item deep learning 2: complete neural network implementation in Theano, TensorFlow
\item CNN in Theano and TensorFlow
\item expression recognition project using regression and CNN
\item computer vision in keras: vgg, class activation map, keras cnn, object detection
\item neural style transfer project
\item Bayes classifier using scipy and scikit-learn
\item single hidden layer autoencoder and deep convolutional Generative Adversarial Networks (dcGANs) in TensorFlow
\item image classification TensorFlow sample project
\item PPT made for short group discussion: intro\emph{to}deep\_learning.pdf
\end{itemize}

I used the textbook: Deep Learning (Ian Goodfellow, Yoshua Bengio, and Aaron Courville) for more detailed theory.

\chapter*{Machine Learning Workspace on Linux}

Working examples and projects focused on image-to-image deep learning. Trained on Ubuntu 18.04.
* Densenet
* keras
* cnn using tensorflow

\subsection*{Specs and Software Versions:}

\begin{itemize}
\item 12 core Intel i7 8700K
\item Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070
\item Ubuntu 18.04
\item python 3.6
\item Tensorflow 1.12
\item Keras 2.2.4
\item CUDA 10.0 
\item CUDNN 7.3.1 
\item OpenCV 3.31
\end{itemize}
